au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.server.pages

Class AbstractPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.server.pages.AbstractPage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutPage, ConfigPage, DocPage, ErrorPage, IndexPage, InfoPage, LoginPage, LogsPage, OperationsPage, PrimitivePage, StatusPage

    public abstract class AbstractPage
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for the a embedded server page.
